title: GT 4.0 Java CoG Kit: System Administrator's Guide

section.title: Introduction
section.para: This guide contains installation and configuration information for system administrators installing the Java CoG Kit. It explains how to install, configure and test the installation.
This information is in addition to the basic installation instructions in the GT 4.0 System Administrator's Guide.

section.title: Building and installing
section.para: Describe how to build and install the Java CoG Kit.

section.title: Configuring
section.para: Describe ways to configure a Java CoG installation.

section.title: Deploying
section.para: Describe how to deploy Java CoG in a particular environment (standalone container and TomCat).

section.title: Testing
section.para: Describe how to test the Java CoG installation.
